Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Lactocin 705beta (lac705beta; chain b of Lactocin 705; Bacteriocin)
Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the class IIb bacteriocin
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Several lactic acid bacteria, Listeria, Streptococci, etc.
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Comments: No comments found on DRAMP database

Literature.Title: Identification and nucleotide sequence of genes involved in the synthesis of lactocin 705, a two-peptide bacteriocin from Lactobacillus casei CRL 705.
